title: Pause a Marketing Campaign
description: A marketing manager discovers an error in a scheduled email campaign and needs to pause it before it sends.

tasks.description: Find the scheduled campaign in the marketing platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager locates the campaign that needs to be stopped.
The campaign's status is changed to 'Paused'.

tasks.description: Correct the error in the email and then reschedule the campaign.
tasks.expected_outcome: A potential error is averted, and the corrected campaign is ready to be sent.
